column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My experience at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba was completely underwhelming.  The mark was missed with many of our plates.  The cold potato salad had way too much raw garlic in it
column2: bread was stale and difficult to eat.  The paella was uninspired and soggy
column3: lacking the crunchy texture that is typical for paella
column4: perhaps they should call it pilaf.  The hot potato plate totally hit the spot however
column5: and the escargot plate was tasty.
